Authors: C Bijeesh, A Kumar Manoj, C K Pradeep, K. B. Vrinda
Title: A new species of Hohenbuehelia (Pleurotaceae) from India
Abstract:
Hohenbuehelia odorata sp.nov. is described based on
morphological as well as molecular (nrITS) data from Kerala State,
India. The macro and micromorphological features in conjunction with
nrITS-based phylogenetic analysis performed using Maximum Likelihood
(ML) method supported the novelty of H. odorata. Complete morphological
descriptions, photographs and comparisons with similar species as well
as a key to the known species of Hohenbuehelia from India are
provided.
